text: The Destroyer of Khorne channels the very essence of bloodlust and fury, gaining momentum with each smite and feat.
Destroyer of Khorne: Victories provide momentum and subsequent boons
Khorne's Curse: When defeated Khorne's punishment will be unrelenting
The Destroyer of Khorne channels the very essence of bloodlust and fury, gaining momentum with each smite
At max effect intensity, grants the [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/executor.png]][[/img]] Executor attribute
Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Hounds of Khorne units
The Undefeated destroyer of Khorne is the very paragon of the God of bloodlust, bringer of ruin.
